product.description: Notes on product sizing

product.description: Describes how the product is constructed

product.name: Care Instructions
product.description: How to take care of the product

product.name: Materials
product.description: Describes the materials used to create the product

product.name: Color
product.description: Defines the primary color or pattern, such as blue or striped

product.name: Age group
product.description: Defines the target age range for a product, such as adults or kids

product.name: Closure type
product.description: Defines the method used to fasten or secure a product, such as zipper or buckles

product.name: Target gender
product.description: Identifies the intended gender for a product, such as female, male or unisex

product.name: Shoe fit
product.description: Defines the width of footwear, such as narrow or wide

product.name: Toe style
product.description: Defines the shape or design of a shoe's toe, such as open or pointed

product.name: Occasion style
product.description: Helps categorize products based on occasion, e.g. casual, dress

product.name: Footwear material
product.description: Specifies the type of material used in footwear, such as suede or rubber

product.name: Shoe features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of shoes, such as waterproof or lightweight

product.name: Flat shoe style
product.description: Identifies the specific design of flat shoes, such as ballet or espadrilles

product.name: Band color
product.description: Specifies the color of a watch band, e.g. multicolor, rose gold

product.name: Dial color
product.description: Specifies the color of a watch's dial or face, such as gold or multicolor

product.name: Case color
product.description: Specifies the color of a product's case, such as clear or white

product.name: Watch material
product.description: Specifies the type of material used for the watch, such as titanium or silicone

product.name: Watch display
product.description: Distinguishes between watch displays, such as digital or analog

product.name: Watch features
product.description: Identifies special characteristics of a watch, such as automatic movement or luminous hands
